scripts.test:e2e:required:json: mkdir -p reports && npx playwright test --grep @required --reporter=json > reports/playwright-required.json
scripts.test:e2e:recommended:json: mkdir -p reports && npx playwright test --grep @recommended --reporter=json > reports/playwright-recommended.json
scripts.test:e2e:optional:json: mkdir -p reports && npx playwright test --grep @optional --reporter=json > reports/playwright-optional.json
scripts.test:e2e:coverage:required: npm run test:e2e:required:json && python3 tools/e2e_coverage_report.py --tier required --results reports/playwright-required.json --json-out reports/e2e-coverage-required.json --md-out reports/e2e-coverage-required.md --min-coverage 90 --strict-mapping
scripts.test:e2e:coverage:recommended: npm run test:e2e:recommended:json && python3 tools/e2e_coverage_report.py --tier recommended --results reports/playwright-recommended.json --json-out reports/e2e-coverage-recommended.json --md-out reports/e2e-coverage-recommended.md --strict-mapping
scripts.test:e2e:coverage:optional: npm run test:e2e:optional:json && python3 tools/e2e_coverage_report.py --tier optional --results reports/playwright-optional.json --json-out reports/e2e-coverage-optional.json --md-out reports/e2e-coverage-optional.md --strict-mapping
scripts.test:e2e:coverage:all: npm run test:e2e:required:json && npm run test:e2e:recommended:json && npm run test:e2e:optional:json && python3 tools/e2e_coverage_report.py --tier all --results reports/playwright-required.json reports/playwright-recommended.json reports/playwright-optional.json --json-out reports/e2e-coverage.json --md-out reports/e2e-coverage.md --strict-mapping
